WRITING.TEXT: Walked into my apartment during burglary. Flipped on the light switch and there they were, two kids about to make off with my laptop, guitar, and my roommates bass guitar. The kids were caught off guard and tried to fast talk their way out of my apartment saying they were just going to grab some things to jam with johnny down the hallway. Thats when I told them that I was Johnny, and the only jamming going on is them outta my apartment.
